722725f-a.text:
160-162 Riverside Drive, at and adjoining the N.E. corner of
88th Street.
1923.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.

733248f-a.title: Squatters Colony at the Hudson River.
733248f-a.folder: 88th Street and Riverside Drive, Manhattan, N.Y.

733249f-c.title: Squatters Colony at the Hudson River.
733249f-c.text:
(1)
Squatters shack, stilted over the Hudson River's edge, at about West 89th Street.
April 29, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, a closer view, showing two curious visitors.
April 29, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

(3)
Squatters lunching amid the ruins of their shacks (wrecked by a sudden storm), at the Hudson River's edge, at about West 88th Street.
April 29, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
